author: Amos Toh
title: Big Data Could Undermine the Covid-19 Response
description: Blind spots in location tracking data can threaten both public health and human rights.
content: The coronavirus pandemic has spurred interest in big data to track the spread of the fast-moving pathogen and to plan disease prevention efforts. But the urgent need to contain the outbreak shouldnt cloud thinking about big datas potential to do more harm tha… [+5691 chars]
